user_query: I'm planning a romantic dinner for my partner and I want to make it extra special. Can you suggest some fancy burger recipes that I can prepare? It would be helpful if you can provide me with the step-by-step instructions for each recipe. Also, do you have any tips on how to set up a romantic ambiance?

TaskList.description: Research and gather fancy burger recipes suitable for a romantic dinner.
Compile step-by-step instructions for each selected burger recipe.
Research tips to set up a romantic dinner ambiance.
Combine the recipes and ambiance tips into a cohesive plan for the romantic dinner.
